item.title: About
item.description:
Hello this about page is all about me Link to heading

I’m just a guy thats interested in technology: computers, robots, crypto, mechanics, radio and doubtless other things i have yet to discover.   󱘗  󱨚   󱄅   This blog is my attempt to put some of the more obscure stuff I’ve learned online. I hope you enjoy it, and maybe even find a few useful tips along the way. The quality of the posts on here will probably vary a lot so be prepared!
